title: Drawing, The Castle from Old Faithful, Yellowstone Park, 1892
title_raw: The Castle from Old Faithful, Yellowstone Park
signed: Signed with monogram and dated in graphite, lower right: 1892.
inscribed:
Recto: Many notations inscribed in graphite, lower left: steam / Old Faithful; and again, lower right is the monogram and: cold white/ stream/ 1892; across top: The Castle from Old Faithful, sunset glow after Rain. Hills balck purple/ green/ clouds red glow to orange, contrasted with cold top/ Reflections in the pools of Old Faithful from Brilliant yellow green whte to / a blood red in foreground.

Verso: Inscribed in graphite with color notations throughout; and in ?: No. 290.
description:
Recto: horizontal and diagrammatic view of the Castle from Old Faithful at sunset.
Verso: vertical view of the great geyser.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, The Castle from Old Faithful, Yellowstone Park, 1892. Graphite on cream-colored paper. 
Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-56
